speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: I pray you, daughter, sing, or express yourself

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: in a more comfortable sort. If my son were my

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: husband, I should freelier rejoice in that absence

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: wherein he won honor than in the embracements

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: of his bed where he would show most love. When

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: yet he was but tender-bodied and the only son of

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: my womb, when youth with comeliness plucked

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: all gaze his way, when for a day of kings’ entreaties

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: a mother should not sell him an hour from her beholding,

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: I, considering how honor would become

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: such a person—that it was no better than picture-like

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: to hang by th’ wall, if renown made it not

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: stir—was pleased to let him seek danger where he

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: was like to find fame. To a cruel war I sent him,

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: from whence he returned, his brows bound with

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: oak. I tell thee, daughter, I sprang not more in joy

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: at first hearing he was a man-child than now in

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: first seeing he had proved himself a man.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: But had he died in the business, madam, how

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: then?

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: Then his good report should have been my

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: son; I therein would have found issue. Hear me

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: profess sincerely: had I a dozen sons, each in my

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: love alike and none less dear than thine and my

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: good Martius, I had rather had eleven die nobly

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: for their country than one voluptuously surfeit out

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: of action.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Madam, the Lady Valeria is come to

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: visit you.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text:
Beseech
               
              you
              ,
               
              give
               
              me
               
              leave
               
              to
               
              retire
               
              myself
              .

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Indeed
               
              you
               
              shall
               
              not
              .

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Methinks
               
              I
               
              hear
               
              hither
               
              your
               
              husband’s
               
              drum
              ,

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
See
               
              him
               
              pluck
               
              Aufidius
               
              down
               
              by
               
              th’
               
              hair
              ;

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
As
               
              children
               
              from
               
              a
               
              bear
              ,
               
              the
               
              Volsces
               
              shunning
               
              him
              .

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Methinks
               
              I
               
              see
               
              him
               
              stamp
               
              thus
               
              and
               
              call
               
              thus
              :

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
“
              Come
               
              on
              ,
               
              you
               
              cowards
              !
               
              You
               
              were
               
              got
               
              in
               
              fear
              ,

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Though
               
              you
               
              were
               
              born
               
              in
               
              Rome
              .
              ”
               
              His
               
              bloody
               
              brow

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
With
               
              his
               
              mailed
               
              hand
               
              then
               
              wiping
              ,
               
              forth
               
              he
               
              goes

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Like
               
              to
               
              a
               
              harvestman
               
              that’s
               
              tasked
               
              to
               
              mow

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Or
               
              all
               
              or
               
              lose
               
              his
               
              hire
              .

speaker: VIRGILIA
text:
His
               
              bloody
               
              brow
              ?
               
              O
               
              Jupiter
              ,
               
              no
               
              blood
              !

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Away
              ,
               
              you
               
              fool
              !
               
              It
               
              more
               
              becomes
               
              a
               
              man

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Than
               
              gilt
               
              his
               
              trophy
              .
               
              The
               
              breasts
               
              of
               
              Hecuba
              ,

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
When
               
              she
               
              did
               
              suckle
               
              Hector
              ,
               
              looked
               
              not
               
              lovelier

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
Than
               
              Hector’s
               
              forehead
               
              when
               
              it
               
              spit
               
              forth
               
              blood

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
At
               
              Grecian
               
              sword
              ,
               
              contemning
              .
              —
              Tell
               
              Valeria

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
We
               
              are
               
              fit
               
              to
               
              bid
               
              her
               
              welcome
              .

speaker: VIRGILIA
text:
Heavens
               
              bless
               
              my
               
              lord
               
              from
               
              fell
               
              Aufidius
              !

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
He’ll
               
              beat
               
              Aufidius’
               
              head
               
              below
               
              his
               
              knee

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text:
And
               
              tread
               
              upon
               
              his
               
              neck
              .

speaker: VALERIA
text: My ladies both, good day to you.

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: Sweet madam.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: I am glad to see your Ladyship.

speaker: VALERIA
text: How do you both? You are manifest housekeepers.

speaker: VALERIA
text: What are you sewing here? A fine spot, in

speaker: VALERIA
text: good faith. How does your little son?

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: I thank your Ladyship; well, good madam.

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: He had rather see the swords and hear a

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: drum than look upon his schoolmaster.

speaker: VALERIA
text: O’ my word, the father’s son! I’ll swear ’tis a

speaker: VALERIA
text: very pretty boy. O’ my troth, I looked upon him o’

speaker: VALERIA
text: Wednesday half an hour together. H’as such a confirmed

speaker: VALERIA
text: countenance. I saw him run after a gilded

speaker: VALERIA
text: butterfly, and when he caught it, he let it go again,

speaker: VALERIA
text: and after it again, and over and over he comes,

speaker: VALERIA
text: and up again, catched it again. Or whether his fall

speaker: VALERIA
text: enraged him or how ’twas, he did so set his teeth

speaker: VALERIA
text: and tear it. O, I warrant how he mammocked it!

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: One on ’s father’s moods.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Indeed, la, ’tis a noble child.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: A crack, madam.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Come, lay aside your stitchery. I must have

speaker: VALERIA
text: you play the idle huswife with me this afternoon.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: No, good madam, I will not out of doors.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Not out of doors?

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: She shall, she shall.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: Indeed, no, by your patience. I’ll not over the

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: threshold till my lord return from the wars.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Fie, you confine yourself most unreasonably.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Come, you must go visit the good lady that lies in.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: I will wish her speedy strength and visit her

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: with my prayers, but I cannot go thither.

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: Why, I pray you?

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: ’Tis not to save labor, nor that I want love.

speaker: VALERIA
text: You would be another Penelope. Yet they say

speaker: VALERIA
text: all the yarn she spun in Ulysses’ absence did but fill

speaker: VALERIA
text: Ithaca full of moths. Come, I would your cambric

speaker: VALERIA
text: were sensible as your finger, that you might leave

speaker: VALERIA
text: pricking it for pity. Come, you shall go with us.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: No, good madam, pardon me; indeed, I will

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: not forth.

speaker: VALERIA
text: In truth, la, go with me, and I’ll tell you excellent

speaker: VALERIA
text: news of your husband.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: O, good madam, there can be none yet.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Verily, I do not jest with you. There came

speaker: VALERIA
text: news from him last night.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: Indeed, madam!

speaker: VALERIA
text: In earnest, it’s true. I heard a senator speak it.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Thus it is: the Volsces have an army forth, against

speaker: VALERIA
text: whom Cominius the General is gone with one

speaker: VALERIA
text: part of our Roman power. Your lord and Titus Lartius

speaker: VALERIA
text: are set down before their city Corioles. They

speaker: VALERIA
text: nothing doubt prevailing, and to make it brief

speaker: VALERIA
text: wars. This is true, on mine honor, and so, I pray, go

speaker: VALERIA
text: with us.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: Give me excuse, good madam. I will obey you

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: in everything hereafter.

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: Let her alone, lady. As she is now, she will

speaker: VOLUMNIA
text: but disease our better mirth.

speaker: VALERIA
text: In troth, I think she would.—Fare you well,

speaker: VALERIA
text: then.—Come, good sweet lady.—Prithee, Virgilia,

speaker: VALERIA
text: turn thy solemness out o’ door, and go along with

speaker: VALERIA
text: us.

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: No, at a word, madam. Indeed, I must not. I

speaker: VIRGILIA
text: wish you much mirth.

speaker: VALERIA
text: Well, then, farewell.
